name: Tech Innovators
description: A club for students passionate about building software and hardware projects.

name: Campus Photographers
description: Photography walks, workshops and exhibitions around campus.

name: Robotics League
description: Design, build and compete with robots across local competitions.

name: Debate Society
description: Prepare for parliamentary-style debates and intercollege tournaments.

name: Entrepreneurship Cell
description: Founders, bootstraps and startup workshops connecting students and mentors.

name: Music Collective
description: Bands, open mics and studio sessions for musicians on campus.

name: Coding Ninjas
description: Competitive programming, interview prep and weekly practice sessions.

name: Environmental Action Group
description: Campus cleanups, sustainability projects and awareness campaigns.

name: Art & Design Studio
description: Workshops across UI/UX, illustration, and graphic design.

name: Astronomy Club
description: Night sky observations, telescope sessions and astrophotography.

name: Finance & Investment
description: Workshops on investing, markets and student-run investment projects.

name: Dance Crew
description: Choreography sessions and cultural fest performances.

name: AI Research Circle
description: Study groups and projects covering modern AI/ML topics.

name: Literary Club
description: Poetry slams, writing workshops and book discussions.

name: Cinema Society
description: Weekly film screenings and critique sessions.

name: Data Science Club
description: Hackathons, datasets and hands-on workshops covering data science.

name: Photography Club
description: Beginner to advanced photography classes and field trips.

name: Volleyball Club
description: Regular practice sessions and inter-college matches.

name: Chess Association
description: Weekly chess meetups and tournament organization.

name: Blockchain Guild
description: Workshops, talks and projects on blockchain and web3.

name: Cooking Club
description: Recipe swaps, cooking sessions and cultural food nights.

name: Mountaineering Club
description: Trekking trips and safety training for outdoor adventures.

name: Ethical Hacking
description: Security talks, capture-the-flag and safe hacking practices.

name: Language Exchange
description: Practice languages and host cultural exchange sessions.

name: Theatre Troupe
description: Acting classes and staged plays throughout the year.

name: Gardening Collective
description: Community gardening and campus green projects.

name: Mathematics Forum
description: Problem solving sessions, seminars and math outreach.

name: Public Health Volunteers
description: Awareness drives, first-aid training and health camps.

name: Gaming Society
description: Casual and competitive gaming nights, LAN parties and livestreams.

name: Sustainability Lab
description: Student research projects focused on sustainable technologies.
